name: Luna · I
desc: I was heavily injured and unconscious when Raphael found me near the mountains. She brought me back to Yume Academy and took care of me until I healed. However, when I woke up, the only thing I remembered was my name.

name: Luna · II
desc: All I have is my name: Luna. Aside from that, I have no memories, no belongings, and no friends. There's no one here for me…I'm so lonely here.
unlock_desc: Unlock after "Encounter Card Upgrade · 1" reaches Lv.1

name: Luna · III
desc: A person called "Senpai" told me that I am no different from any other girl in the Academy. He invited me to become an official student of the Academy, and even gave me a bunny!
unlock_desc: Unlock after "Encounter Card Upgrade · 1" reaches Lv.2

name: Luna · IV
desc: Senpai's name isn't Senpai, and he told me his name (oﾟ▽ﾟ)o I gave him some snacks I made, will he like them?
unlock_desc: Unlock after "Encounter Card Upgrade · 1" reaches Lv.3

name: Luna · V
desc: Senpai suggested that I join the Baking Club, so it seems like he liked the snacks after all! The Club members are kind and children often visit us for snacks. I don't feel lonely anymore.
unlock_desc: Unlock after "Encounter Card Upgrade · 1" reaches Lv.4

name: Luna · VI
desc: A tall girl, Angelica, visited us for snacks today. She doesn't look like a child. Hey! Don't laugh at her, Frexie, even grown-ups can have a snack now and then!
unlock_desc: Unlock after "Encounter Card Upgrade · 1" reaches Lv.5

name: Luna · VII
desc: I have a feeling that someone is looking at me, but when I look around, the only person I find is Angelica. But it can't be her: a grown-up that likes sweets and snacks so much can't be a bad person!
unlock_desc: Unlock after "Encounter Card Upgrade · 1" reaches Lv.6

name: Blowie · I
desc: It's been an entire week since I'm here at Yume Academy, and I can't take it anymore~ I like it here, but not having large baths are killing me.

name: Blowie · II
desc: I skipped classes and explored the Academy today. This place is like a prison, with no recreation facilities at all! All I want is a nice bathhouse…
unlock_desc: Unlock after "Encounter Card Upgrade · 2" reaches Lv.1

name: Blowie · III
desc: If there are no bathhouses here, I'll build one myself! But it's so tiring, and I want to have a nice long bath~
unlock_desc: Unlock after "Encounter Card Upgrade · 2" reaches Lv.2

name: Blowie · IV
desc: Another day of working on my dream bathhouse. The first thing to do is to dig out a foundation…wait, what is that thing? A dirty oil lamp?
unlock_desc: Unlock after "Encounter Card Upgrade · 2" reaches Lv.3

name: Blowie · V
desc: I dreamed that a pretty girl emerged from the oil lamp, promising me one wish. I wished for a huge bathhouse. I hope it really appears when I wake up!
unlock_desc: Unlock after "Encounter Card Upgrade · 2" reaches Lv.4

name: Blowie · VI
desc: Oh my, my dream bathhouse is really there! I'll go in right away. Wait a minute, where has the lamp gone?
unlock_desc: Unlock after "Encounter Card Upgrade · 2" reaches Lv.5

name: Blowie · VII
desc: There are so many new buildings in Yume Academy now! Music Venues, Game Centers, and is that a Casino? I wonder who has the lamp now…
unlock_desc: Unlock after "Encounter Card Upgrade · 2" reaches Lv.6

name: Angel · I
desc: I need to purify the demons! It's been three months since my arrival at the Academy, but I have not purified any demons yet. I need to get a grip and start doing my job! By the way, what exactly are demons again?

name: Angel · II
desc: I seem to be ignoring the obvious: there is a Demon House right in front of my eyes! Take this, Lucifer!
unlock_desc: Unlock after "Encounter Card Upgrade · 3" reaches Lv.1

name: Angel · III
desc: Michael started an hour-long rant that just ended now. All I wanted to do was to exorcise the demons, but Michael is never wrong. Am I mistaken…?
unlock_desc: Unlock after "Encounter Card Upgrade · 3" reaches Lv.2

name: Angel · IV
desc: I promised Michael to not cause any trouble, but that doesn't mean I accept those of House Demon as my own. I'm definitely not working with them on this expedition…wait a minute, where am I?
unlock_desc: Unlock after "Encounter Card Upgrade · 3" reaches Lv.3

name: Angel · V
desc: What a day: I got lost in the wilderness and it started raining cats and dogs. What's worse, a ghost appeared in front of me. Thankfully I had some holy water with me to expel it…is that Wraith from House Demon?
unlock_desc: Unlock after "Encounter Card Upgrade · 3" reaches Lv.4

name: Angel · VI
desc: Wraith is very kind: she lead the way back to the Academy even if I was the one that hurt her. I didn't even have time to apologize properly before I fell unconscious due to a fever.
unlock_desc: Unlock after "Encounter Card Upgrade · 3" reaches Lv.5

name: Angel · VII
desc: I visited House Demon to express my thanks. I don't seem to dislike the students in House Demon as much now…
unlock_desc: Unlock after "Encounter Card Upgrade · 3" reaches Lv.6

name: Fenrir · I
desc: I dragged my beat and battered body back home after another fight with a God. Dinner was ready, and Mother urged me to have some delicious roasted dragon.

name: Fenrir · II
desc: I am not born from Mother's womb; her child by blood has long passed away. When I was about to be killed by the Gods, Mother traded her powers as the Divine Wolf for my life and took me under her wing.
unlock_desc: Unlock after "Encounter Card Upgrade · 4" reaches Lv.1

name: Fenrir · III
desc: Despite Mother's protection, the Gods still sought for my life; after all, I am the one destined to end the Gods' reign over the world.
unlock_desc: Unlock after "Encounter Card Upgrade · 4" reaches Lv.2

name: Fenrir · IV
desc: Fewer attempts are made on my life lately. It seems like the Gods' attention is focused on the mundane planet, where the humans raged war against them. Can humans truly be worthy opponents for Gods? I can't wait to find out myself.
unlock_desc: Unlock after "Encounter Card Upgrade · 4" reaches Lv.3

name: Fenrir · V
desc: Human warriors are stronger than I expected; I had a rather satisfying battle with a green-haired knight. If even a regular human warrior has such strength, I'd love to witness the power of their chief. I'm having high expectations for you, Ruler of the Suns.
unlock_desc: Unlock after "Encounter Card Upgrade · 4" reaches Lv.4

name: Fenrir · VI
desc: Ruler of the Suns, pfft, how did you ascend to immortality from being a mere mortal? You fit the description of the prophecy even more than I do. But this is not about the prophecy; let's test our strengths against each other, shouldn't we?
unlock_desc: Unlock after "Encounter Card Upgrade · 4" reaches Lv.5

name: Fenrir · VII
desc: Scorching air woke me up from the darkness. How long have I been out for…? All I can see is the huge form of Mother and the golden flames devouring the heavens. The humans have won the war.
unlock_desc: Unlock after "Encounter Card Upgrade · 4" reaches Lv.6

name: Raphael · I
desc: Medical Record 1: Ithil, Team Leader of Squad 11 in Regiment Alpha, underwent leg surgery today. Her calm was unmoving even when she must be feeling extreme pain. She is one of the few that doesn't need to be knocked out before surgery.

name: Raphael · II
desc: Medical Record 2: Three Soldiers-in-training suffered puncture wounds to the stomach. They really show no mercy in training, don't they? Well, tough luck: the Medical Department doesn't show any mercy too.
unlock_desc: Unlock after "Encounter Card Upgrade · 5" reaches Lv.1

name: Raphael · III
desc: Another comrade didn't make it through. She was woken forcefully by the pain during the operation and it had to be paused halfway. If only there is a method to stop the patients from feeling pain…
unlock_desc: Unlock after "Encounter Card Upgrade · 5" reaches Lv.2

name: Raphael · IV
desc: After consulting with a coworker in the Medical Department, I learned about Ember Lilies, a poisonous plant that paralyzes the human body. However, it is fatal when taken directly.
unlock_desc: Unlock after "Encounter Card Upgrade · 5" reaches Lv.3

name: Raphael · V
desc: I acquired some seeds of the Ember Lily and tried planting them. However, I can't weaken the poison for it to be safe for the human body…
unlock_desc: Unlock after "Encounter Card Upgrade · 5" reaches Lv.4

name: Raphael · VI
desc: A friend brought me some research notes about the plant; perhaps she once looked into its potential as well. It helped tremendously with my research.
unlock_desc: Unlock after "Encounter Card Upgrade · 5" reaches Lv.5

name: Raphael · VII
desc: The experiment is a success! The new anesthetic should be available for use soon. I can't wait to share the good news with my friend!
unlock_desc: Unlock after "Encounter Card Upgrade · 5" reaches Lv.6

name: Teresa · I
desc: The Father taught me everything I needed to know, and I always looked up to him. However, with the number of disciples dwindling, he has to preach on the streets instead of in the church where he should be.

name: Teresa · II
desc: The few disciples we have feign devotion and break every Commandment there is when the Father isn't looking. I've seen them with my own eyes.
unlock_desc: Unlock after "Encounter Card Upgrade · 6" reaches Lv.1

name: Teresa · III
desc: I "persuaded" people to visit our church through unorthodox means. The Father seems content, and I am as well for seeing him like that. The church is indeed where he belongs.
unlock_desc: Unlock after "Encounter Card Upgrade · 6" reaches Lv.2

name: Teresa · IV
desc: He was upset because he found out about what I did, but all I wanted was to see him smile. He just doesn't understand…words don't hold any power, but he refuses to listen…
unlock_desc: Unlock after "Encounter Card Upgrade · 6" reaches Lv.3

name: Teresa · V
desc: Why is he upset? Is it because the disciples are here due to threats and bribery instead of his precious preachings?
unlock_desc: Unlock after "Encounter Card Upgrade · 6" reaches Lv.4

name: Teresa · VI
desc: The holy text and the commandments of the Deity he believes in hold no power over the people, but violence does. He finally understands, but he left…
unlock_desc: Unlock after "Encounter Card Upgrade · 6" reaches Lv.5

name: Teresa · VII
desc: Some students in the Academy still preach about whatever doctrine that no one but themselves cares about. Trust me, I know by experience.
unlock_desc: Unlock after "Encounter Card Upgrade · 6" reaches Lv.6

name: Bud Elf · I
desc: The season when the roses wilt immediately after they bloom has finally passed! Look at the Golden Mustard bushes, aren't the flowers pretty? No, Susan, they cannot be used in the kitchen. Golden Mustards are roses!

name: Bud Elf · II
desc: Monica, the newcomer, looks at me weirdly, but I don't care! My flower friends are the best!
unlock_desc: Unlock after "Encounter Card Upgrade · 7" reaches Lv.1

name: Bud Elf · II
desc: Hey! Stop running beside the flower fields, they will be hurt if you step on them! I'm not lying, they have feelings too!
unlock_desc: Unlock after "Encounter Card Upgrade · 7" reaches Lv.2

name: Bud Elf · IV
desc: I shouldn't have talked about the plants talking to those people, they keep insinuating that I'm lying or out of my mind. I like Saint, she doesn't do any of these things.
unlock_desc: Unlock after "Encounter Card Upgrade · 7" reaches Lv.3

name: Bud Elf · V
desc: Saint says that she believes me that plants have feelings! I'll give her a bunch of buttercups tomorrow, I hope she can hear them speaking as I do!
unlock_desc: Unlock after "Encounter Card Upgrade · 7" reaches Lv.4

name: Bud Elf · VI
desc: Hehe, it's okay, Saint, I stopped caring about how the others talk about me. I think I'm used to it now.
unlock_desc: Unlock after "Encounter Card Upgrade · 7" reaches Lv.5

name: Bud Elf · VII
desc: My strength? I'm not really sure where it came from…it makes people scared of me? I never thought about it, because I'm happy as long as I can stay with my flower friends.
unlock_desc: Unlock after "Encounter Card Upgrade · 7" reaches Lv.6

name: Vera · I
desc: Senpai is sneezing again. Did he catch a cold? I knew that he can't take care of himself without me!

name: Vera · II
desc: I helped Senpai switch to nice, thick comforters. What was he even thinking, using the same thin blankets that he used in summer? No wonder he caught a cold!
unlock_desc: Unlock after "Encounter Card Upgrade · 1" reaches Lv.1

name: Vera · III
desc: The Academy is filled with sneezing students today. It's easy to catch a cold in this season. Perhaps I should start working on recipes that can help the immunity system…achoo!
unlock_desc: Unlock after "Encounter Card Upgrade · 1" reaches Lv.2

name: Vera · IV
desc: Achoo! I can't believe I caught a cold too despite always staying warm and exercising frequently. If even I caught a cold, the others must be faring worse. I need to work on that recipe fast…!
unlock_desc: Unlock after "Encounter Card Upgrade · 1" reaches Lv.3

name: Vera · V
desc: I set up a small table in the Academy for my special recipe and posted announcements about it, but no one came…Achoo! I feel dizzy…what's happening…?
unlock_desc: Unlock after "Encounter Card Upgrade · 1" reaches Lv.4

name: Vera · VI
desc: …Senpai? Raphael? Where am I? …Oh, I had a fever and fainted? I'm so sorry for making you worry…
unlock_desc: Unlock after "Encounter Card Upgrade · 1" reaches Lv.5

name: Vera · VII
desc: Here, Senpai, this is a new dish that I made…wait, you didn't see the announcement? So that's why no one came! I was worried that no one wanted to try my cooking.
unlock_desc: Unlock after "Encounter Card Upgrade · 1" reaches Lv.6

name: Caitlyn · I
desc: (Yawns) Chevalir? Yeah, go on ahead, I'll sleep in today…I stayed up late playing games last night…ZZZZ

name: Caitlyn · II
desc: Fully recovered! I'm staying at home today: nothing beats gaming at home! Hey, what are you doing, taking away my VR goggles like that?!
unlock_desc: Unlock after "Encounter Card Upgrade · 2" reaches Lv.1

name: Caitlyn · III
desc: Wait a minute, I thought the Academy was for girls only? What's a boy like you doing here? Besides, why are you in my room?? Oh, I missed the Opening Ceremony?
unlock_desc: Unlock after "Encounter Card Upgrade · 2" reaches Lv.2

name: Caitlyn · IV
desc: I seem to recall a similar scene from the dating sim I'm playing right now, where the protagonist is the only boy in an all-girls school. What did the students call him again…Master?
unlock_desc: Unlock after "Encounter Card Upgrade · 2" reaches Lv.3

name: Caitlyn · V
desc: Nope, I'm not going out there. Besides, no dating sim protagonist orders the heroine to leave her room. It just doesn't happen!
unlock_desc: Unlock after "Encounter Card Upgrade · 2" reaches Lv.4

name: Caitlyn · VI
desc: Master didn't visit me today. It's his loss, I'll finish this game without him. I can't wait to see what will happen to the girl who refused to leave her room…wait, that's the end??
unlock_desc: Unlock after "Encounter Card Upgrade · 2" reaches Lv.5

name: Caitlyn · VII
desc: Yo, isn't it Senpai? I've started a new game and I'm cosplaying as the bikini-wearing heroine who shoots down zombies at the beach now, so I'm not calling you Master anymore. Or do you still want to be called Master?
unlock_desc: Unlock after "Encounter Card Upgrade · 2" reaches Lv.6

name: Boxer · I
desc: Nice boxing gloves! Sapphire knows me so well. She might say that she doesn't like me, but I know that she cares about me deeply.

name: Boxer · II
desc: More students are infected by Chaos now. I must double my training so I can protect Sapphire, Geisha, and Miya from the infected!
unlock_desc: Unlock after "Encounter Card Upgrade · 3" reaches Lv.1

name: Boxer · III
desc: Why is Sapphire hurt? She wasn't supposed to fight! She should have hidden somewhere safe with the others while I fought outside!
unlock_desc: Unlock after "Encounter Card Upgrade · 3" reaches Lv.2

name: Boxer · IV
desc: Why did you do this, KongMing? Sapphire's hands are for playing musical instruments, not for holding weapons. You must have tricked her to fight for the Discipline Committee!!
unlock_desc: Unlock after "Encounter Card Upgrade · 3" reaches Lv.3

name: Boxer · V
desc: You can save your breath, I don't care or want to hear your pathetic excuses. If you have the guts to face me, meet me on the roof after class today!
unlock_desc: Unlock after "Encounter Card Upgrade · 3" reaches Lv.4

name: Boxer · VI
desc: S-Sapphire? Shouldn't you be resting in the Infirmary…no, of course we're not fighting, right KongMing?
unlock_desc: Unlock after "Encounter Card Upgrade · 3" reaches Lv.5

name: Boxer · VII
desc: Ouch, ouch, ouch, that hurts. Raphael, can you try being more gentle? Thanks…No, Sapphire, I don't mean that you hit hard or anything. This is nothing but a scratch…ouch…
unlock_desc: Unlock after "Encounter Card Upgrade · 3" reaches Lv.6

name: Nobunaga · I
desc: Bullied kids flock to me like chicks to a mother hen. I don't know why they act like this, but I won't let them down.

name: Nobunaga · II
desc: The adults look down upon me because I'm not the model student that they wanted. They try to stop the kids from following my lead but to no avail. The kids make their own decisions, and they have decided to stay with me.
unlock_desc: Unlock after "Encounter Card Upgrade · 4" reaches Lv.1

name: Nobunaga · III
desc: I am known as being idiotic, violent, absolutely-out-of-my-mind, what else? What they say about me doesn't affect me at all; I know what I should do with my life.
unlock_desc: Unlock after "Encounter Card Upgrade · 4" reaches Lv.2

name: Nobunaga · IV
desc: Interesting, someone dares to challenge my authority. They can have the title of King if they want it: King or not, my followers chose to follow me with their own will, not due to a useless title.
unlock_desc: Unlock after "Encounter Card Upgrade · 4" reaches Lv.3

name: Nobunaga · V
desc: My sister seems to be envious of my reputation. However, I have no plans of sharing my position with her, even if she is close to me personally.
unlock_desc: Unlock after "Encounter Card Upgrade · 4" reaches Lv.4

name: Nobunaga · VI
desc: It's time to assert my authority and position as the only rightful leader of House Monster. I will prove that I am more than a mindless simpleton.
unlock_desc: Unlock after "Encounter Card Upgrade · 4" reaches Lv.5

name: Nobunaga · VII
desc: There are few people that you can truly trust in your life; everyone will end up betraying you, even the most loyal of subordinates. The fire in Honnoji Temple destroyed any trust I had in others.
unlock_desc: Unlock after "Encounter Card Upgrade · 4" reaches Lv.6

name: Diana · I
desc: The winter sun shines brightly at noon. I promised my sister an outdoor picnic today in the grassy fields…she loved nature.

name: Diana · II
desc: The lights dimmed, and ominous violet fumes lurked on the landscape. We ended the picnic prematurely, and my sister wasn't happy with this.
unlock_desc: Unlock after "Encounter Card Upgrade · 5" reaches Lv.1

name: Diana · III
desc: Everyone in town noticed the change in weather, but no one knew the reason. My sister trailed sullenly behind me as we made our way back, complaining that I don't keep my promises.
unlock_desc: Unlock after "Encounter Card Upgrade · 5" reaches Lv.2

name: Diana · IV
desc: The purple mist formed into a huge claw, destroying houses and uprooting trees. My neighbors struggled but were eventually sucked into the void.
unlock_desc: Unlock after "Encounter Card Upgrade · 5" reaches Lv.3

name: Diana · V
desc: I ran. When I looked back, I couldn't find my sister anywhere. Where was my sister? …Where am I?
unlock_desc: Unlock after "Encounter Card Upgrade · 5" reaches Lv.4

name: Diana · VI
desc: I forgot something important. It's like something was ripped out of my chest, but I couldn't quite put a finger on what it was. I felt lost…and anguished.
unlock_desc: Unlock after "Encounter Card Upgrade · 5" reaches Lv.5

name: Diana · VII
desc: The sun and the moon were meant to be together: I thrive under the moonlight, but only the sunlight can comfort me. I can't live without one or the other.
unlock_desc: Unlock after "Encounter Card Upgrade · 5" reaches Lv.6

name: Sakura · I
desc: A girl asked me: "Do you feel sorrowful when the cherry blossoms wither and fall?" I felt that she was referring to my name Sakura and she seemed to imply that my fate shares that of the cherry blossoms.

name: Sakura · II
desc: She apologized profusely when she realized how offensive the question was. She didn't have to; I didn't take it to heart. If I am destined to live like the short-lived flower, then all I need to do is to make sure I live my life to the fullest before I pass away.
unlock_desc: Unlock after "Encounter Card Upgrade · 6" reaches Lv.1

name: Sakura · III
desc: The petals of the cherry blossoms fall like rain, and I am enchanted by the sight. Unfortunately, most fail to appreciate the beauty of the withering flowers and focus only on the blooming blossoms.
unlock_desc: Unlock after "Encounter Card Upgrade · 6" reaches Lv.2

name: Sakura · IV
desc: People often take me as a fickle person due to my love for cherry blossoms. I understand neither their logic behind this nor their audacity of making assumptions about people that they don't really know.
unlock_desc: Unlock after "Encounter Card Upgrade · 6" reaches Lv.3

name: Sakura · V
desc: I was training with my sword under the cherry blossom trees when the petals began to fall. I didn't want to hurt the blossoms, so I stopped.
unlock_desc: Unlock after "Encounter Card Upgrade · 6" reaches Lv.4

name: Sakura · VI
desc: When watching the petals, I found out that they fall rhythmically, like notes in music. I can't help but dance to the "music" they play.
unlock_desc: Unlock after "Encounter Card Upgrade · 6" reaches Lv.5

name: Sakura · VII
desc: I felt sudden bouts of joy and sadness when dancing. When I came back to my senses, I found that I was surrounded by other students watching me. How embarrassing…
unlock_desc: Unlock after "Encounter Card Upgrade · 6" reaches Lv.6

name: Hottie · I
desc: Graduate from Yume Academy? Why should I, when there are so many cute girls on campus that I can still teach?

name: Hottie · II
desc: Saint seems to be one of those more rebellious students. Unfortunately for her, she's just my type~
unlock_desc: Unlock after "Encounter Card Upgrade · 7" reaches Lv.1

name: Hottie · III
desc: Oooh, look at how prettily she blushes with my "Ribbon of Lust"! Where has her cold and aloof expression gone, hmm?
unlock_desc: Unlock after "Encounter Card Upgrade · 7" reaches Lv.2

name: Hottie · IV
desc: I hope she won't skip my classes next time; I'd like to believe that I have built a good rapport with her now.
unlock_desc: Unlock after "Encounter Card Upgrade · 7" reaches Lv.3

name: Hottie · V
desc: Nobunaga, you're one of those students too, aren't you? You're putting on a brave face, but your voice is trembling…I suppose you need some "private lessons" from me too~
unlock_desc: Unlock after "Encounter Card Upgrade · 7" reaches Lv.4

name: Hottie · VI
desc: I try my best to help my students grow into their better selves with my "Ribbon of Lust"…are you ready?
unlock_desc: Unlock after "Encounter Card Upgrade · 7" reaches Lv.5

name: Hottie · VII
desc: I always feel great after chatting with my students. However, when I am all alone in my dorms and reminiscing the time spent with them…I start to feel lonely.
unlock_desc: Unlock after "Encounter Card Upgrade · 7" reaches Lv.6

name: Robbie · I
desc: Why didn't anyone believe me when all that I said was the truth? I get reprimanded for telling them what I saw... No, please, please don't throw me in the storeroom again...

name: Robbie · II
desc: Uncle finally forgave me and promised not to shut me in the storeroom after I apologized to everyone and said that I "lied" to them. Do the adults not like it when I speak the truth...?
unlock_desc: Unlock after "Encounter Card Upgrade · 1" reaches Lv.1

name: Robbie · III
desc: A girl was missing and everyone is looking for her. I saw her leave with a stranger last night, but should I tell them?
unlock_desc: Unlock after "Encounter Card Upgrade · 1" reaches Lv.2

name: Robbie · IV
desc: If I do, should I speak the truth or not? Which answer would make them happy? I don't know what to do... Oh! If I don't say anything, I won't be saying something wrong. I should do that.
unlock_desc: Unlock after "Encounter Card Upgrade · 1" reaches Lv.3

name: Robbie · V
desc: 這次，沒有人罵我……這樣就很好，不要和他們說話……
unlock_desc: Unlock after "Encounter Card Upgrade · 1" reaches Lv.4

name: Robbie · VI
desc: 「強大的精神力，很適合我新研發的機甲呢，你叫什麼？想要個新朋友嗎？」羅比……不要說話……不要朋友……
unlock_desc: Unlock after "Encounter Card Upgrade · 1" reaches Lv.5

name: Robbie · VII
desc: 「原來經歷過這種事，真是哪裡都有愚蠢的人類。不過愛琳不是人哦，和AI說話的話，說什麼都沒關係。」艾、琳？
unlock_desc: Unlock after "Encounter Card Upgrade · 1" reaches Lv.6

name: Yuri · I
desc: 我是什麼？我是田豐。那田豐又是什麼……啊，我和蘑菇長得一樣，所以我也是蘑菇吧！

name: Yuri · II
desc: 蘑菇不會跑，所以我也不能跑來跑去，但是好餓……為什麼我不能和其他蘑菇一樣吃泥土呢，我壞掉了嗎？
unlock_desc: Unlock after "Encounter Card Upgrade · 2" reaches Lv.1

name: Yuri · III
desc: 餓得受不了了，這裡就是人類的食堂吧，偷偷來找點吃的~要小心別被人類發現，不然我就要變成蘑菇湯了。
unlock_desc: Unlock after "Encounter Card Upgrade · 2" reaches Lv.2

name: Yuri · IV
desc: 嗚啊啊啊被抓到了……那個，你看我很漂亮吧，漂亮的蘑菇都是有毒的，所以我也是有毒的蘑菇，不可以吃我哦！
unlock_desc: Unlock after "Encounter Card Upgrade · 2" reaches Lv.3

name: Yuri · V
desc: 祝融沒有吃我，還給我好吃的，喜歡祝融！這個超級好吃的烤串是用什麼做的呀……欸？蘑菇？
unlock_desc: Unlock after "Encounter Card Upgrade · 2" reaches Lv.4

name: Yuri · VI
desc: 蘑菇不該吃蘑菇，可蘑菇好好吃……欸？我不是蘑菇？但你看我和蘑菇一樣……我不是蘑菇的話，就可以吃蘑菇了！
unlock_desc: Unlock after "Encounter Card Upgrade · 2" reaches Lv.5

name: Yuri · VII
desc: 這裡的蘑菇田就交給我吧！我會讓蘑菇們快快長大的，有我在一定會讓蘑菇田大豐收，我的名字可是「田豐」呢！
unlock_desc: Unlock after "Encounter Card Upgrade · 2" reaches Lv.6

name: Skye · I
desc: 想要站起來，但……身體已經動不了了……火焰、鐵銹、硝煙……在人生最後，我還是沒能聞到和平的氣味啊……

name: Skye · II
desc: 「你，想要活下去嗎？」……是誰，惡魔嗎？如果是想要引發災禍與戰亂的惡魔，我絕不會和你進行任何交易。
unlock_desc: Unlock after "Encounter Card Upgrade · 3" reaches Lv.1

name: Skye · III
desc: 「我只是想要人體實驗的原料，叫我惡魔也太過分了哭哭……代價只有你的身體，但我會讓你活下來。怎麼樣？」
unlock_desc: Unlock after "Encounter Card Upgrade · 3" reaches Lv.2

name: Skye · IV
desc: 不是惡魔的話，就全都交給你吧……這破爛的身體如果還能投入維護和平的事業中，付出什麼代價都無所謂。
unlock_desc: Unlock after "Encounter Card Upgrade · 3" reaches Lv.3

name: Skye · V
desc: 啊痛痛痛！！！魯班大人下手可以輕一點嗎……停下？才不要停下，我只是隨便喊喊而已，請給我更深度的改造！
unlock_desc: Unlock after "Encounter Card Upgrade · 3" reaches Lv.4

name: Skye · VI
desc: 飛起來了~風在我的血管裡流淌，我和風融為一體……不，比風更快，比風更強，這樣的我一定能阻止所有紛爭！
unlock_desc: Unlock after "Encounter Card Upgrade · 3" reaches Lv.5

name: Skye · VII
desc: 去幽夢學園？可這邊的戰亂還沒有平息……但既然是魯班大人的要求，一定有什麼我不明白的意義吧，我馬上就出發。
unlock_desc: Unlock after "Encounter Card Upgrade · 3" reaches Lv.6

name: Hermes · I
desc: 趁著混沌入侵，資本家大發橫財，看來無論和平和戰亂，受苦的都是窮人，可我又能為他們做些什麼呢？

name: Hermes · II
desc: 那個老傢伙還邀請我去他的海邊別墅喝紅酒，商量怎麼發國難財。呵，如果他把人當人，現在也成不了富翁吧。
unlock_desc: Unlock after "Encounter Card Upgrade · 4" reaches Lv.1

name: Hermes · III
desc: 我拒絕他後，他笑得很油膩，說我想清楚後，總會再回來找他。真讓我想吐。如果財富建立在屍骸之上，我寧可不要。
unlock_desc: Unlock after "Encounter Card Upgrade · 4" reaches Lv.2

name: Hermes · IV
desc: 市長通知我，敵方很快會從南部攻上來，要我和他一起從東方逃到鄰國避難……可是南部那些毫不知情的平民又該如何？
unlock_desc: Unlock after "Encounter Card Upgrade · 4" reaches Lv.3

name: Hermes · V
desc: 我試圖在媒體上爭奪話語權，把平民需要的資訊發佈出來……可是市長和那些老商人一直這樣那樣地阻礙我……
unlock_desc: Unlock after "Encounter Card Upgrade · 4" reaches Lv.4

name: Hermes · VI
desc: 看來我累積的資本還不足以動搖這座城市腐壞的運行規則……此時此刻，我該怎麼辦呢，動動腦筋，想想！
unlock_desc: Unlock after "Encounter Card Upgrade · 4" reaches Lv.5

name: Hermes · VII
desc: 我回到那老傢伙那去了，我痛恨我自己，可是我別無選擇……但我發誓很快，我將傾盡所有補償這座城市，和這裡的人。
unlock_desc: Unlock after "Encounter Card Upgrade · 4" reaches Lv.6

name: Blair · I
desc: 又要出門工作了，這回要殺個什麼製藥公司的老闆，叫什麼我都記不住，但是無所謂了，反正今晚之後他就是個死人了。

name: Blair · II
desc: 他好像知道自己罪有應得……他賣的藥假借止痛的名義害死了多少人，雖然不關我的事，但我看到這種道貌岸然的人就噁心。
unlock_desc: Unlock after "Encounter Card Upgrade · 5" reaches Lv.1

name: Blair · III
desc: 我和這傢伙住在一起有一段時間了，她總是告訴我下一個該殺誰，好像我是一個殺人機器……難道我真的是殺人機器？
unlock_desc: Unlock after "Encounter Card Upgrade · 5" reaches Lv.2

name: Blair · IV
desc: 她對我很溫柔，可有時候又讓我覺得自己一無是處，她說只有好好工作，才算是個乖乖女，才是值得疼愛的人。
unlock_desc: Unlock after "Encounter Card Upgrade · 5" reaches Lv.3

name: Blair · V
desc: 鮮血濺到臉上的時候，我越來越受不了，雖然她總誇我做得很好，但我心靈有一塊地方卻慢慢萎縮下去了，我透不過氣。
unlock_desc: Unlock after "Encounter Card Upgrade · 5" reaches Lv.4

name: Blair · VI
desc: 她把我拋棄了，因為我「不小心」放走了一個重要的目標，我不知道自己怎麼了，我本可以殺了他，我為什麼沒有！
unlock_desc: Unlock after "Encounter Card Upgrade · 5" reaches Lv.5

name: Blair · VII
desc: 我究竟，出了什麼問題？為什麼，我生命的意義不是殺人嗎，不是的話，又是什麼呢？誰來告訴我，誰能幫幫我……
unlock_desc: Unlock after "Encounter Card Upgrade · 5" reaches Lv.6

name: Librarian · I
desc: 最近每天都泡在圖書館，雖然精神世界相當充實，可是渾身酸痛，看來不出門運動一下，是不行了。

name: Librarian · II
desc: 其實，在《荒原狼》之後，我也看了很多書，可是那本書的結尾，一直盤踞在我腦海裡，真是揮之不去。
unlock_desc: Unlock after "Encounter Card Upgrade · 6" reaches Lv.1

name: Librarian · III
desc: 很多時候都覺得自己和作家在潛意識上，有種奇異的相連，我能在文字裡擴大我的生命經驗，也能不再孤單。
unlock_desc: Unlock after "Encounter Card Upgrade · 6" reaches Lv.2

name: Librarian · IV
desc: 有時在文字中看到自己的影子時，會伴隨一種羞恥感，就像赤身裸體似的讓我不好意思。
unlock_desc: Unlock after "Encounter Card Upgrade · 6" reaches Lv.3

name: Librarian · V
desc: 今天和巴尼拉學姐提到我想不通的問題，她笑著說只是時候未到，她很厲害，是經歷過百年戰爭的大人，我想我該聽她的，耐心點。
unlock_desc: Unlock after "Encounter Card Upgrade · 6" reaches Lv.4

name: Librarian · VI
desc: 特蕾莎同學不知道為什麼，忽然說要請我參加派對……我本想拒絕的，可是僅作為旁觀者閱讀別人的故事，真的算活過嗎？
unlock_desc: Unlock after "Encounter Card Upgrade · 6" reaches Lv.5

name: Librarian · VII
desc: 派對非常熱鬧，全是開朗熱情的同學，特蕾莎勸酒的話術真是讓人無法拒絕……我想我還是不適合這種場合……
unlock_desc: Unlock after "Encounter Card Upgrade · 6" reaches Lv.6

name: Mika · I
desc: 呂蒙揮劍的樣子讓我想到以前，我的老師教我練劍的時候，那時候我還滿懷希望，充滿信心呢，幾年過去，什麼都變了。

name: Mika · II
desc: 呂蒙學得很快，比我想像得聰明很多。她總問我為什麼不拿劍，如果她知道了我的過去，還會信任我嗎？
unlock_desc: Unlock after "Encounter Card Upgrade · 7" reaches Lv.1

name: Mika · III
desc: 天氣變冷了，泥土更容易變乾，這個季節不是做泥塑的好日子……也許我也該讓自己休息一下吧。
unlock_desc: Unlock after "Encounter Card Upgrade · 7" reaches Lv.2

name: Mika · IV
desc: ……對不起……對不起！……啊，又做噩夢了，那場混亂的災難究竟要折磨我到什麼時候，要用我的一輩子去贖罪才夠嗎？
unlock_desc: Unlock after "Encounter Card Upgrade · 7" reaches Lv.3

name: Mika · V
desc: 特蕾莎不知道為什麼很在意我，總好像有什麼想和我談談似的，她看著我的泥人偶，好像能看穿我的歷史那樣。
unlock_desc: Unlock after "Encounter Card Upgrade · 7" reaches Lv.4

name: Mika · VI
desc: 特蕾莎欲言又止，最終邀請我去喝酒，說可以徹底把自己忘掉……像她這麼用力生活的人，究竟是在逃避身後的什麼呢？
unlock_desc: Unlock after "Encounter Card Upgrade · 7" reaches Lv.5

name: Mika · VII
desc: 說實話，微醺的感覺很好，可事後我就良心不安，有人因我而死，我真的可以這麼心安理得嗎？對不起，我不會再去了……
unlock_desc: Unlock after "Encounter Card Upgrade · 7" reaches Lv.6
